metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5857 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm SPCom driver in Android before 7.0 allows local users toexecute arbitrary code within the context of the kernel via a craftedapplication, aka Android internal bug 34386529 and Qualcomm internal bugCR#1094140.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
